actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing William R. Ratchford of Connecticut, as a member of the Committee on Appropriations and electing Marilyn Lloyd Bouquard of Tennessee, as a member of the Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text: Elects the Honorable William R. Ratchford, of Connecticut, to the House Committee on Appropriations and the Honorable Marilyn Lloyd Bouquard, of Tennessee, to the House Committee on Armed Services.

titles.title: A resolution electing William R. Ratchford of Connecticut, as a member of the Committee on Appropriations and electing Marilyn Lloyd Bouquard of Tennessee, as a member of the Committee on Armed Services.
